attributes.action: reccomend Ross Brawn for a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ross Brawn is one of the most successful sportsmen ever in the United Kingdom. We feel it is imperative that his achievements are recognised.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
